column2: PROPOSED  NMB  BANK PLC MAFINGA BRANCH
BILL NR …. - ELECTRICAL INSTALLATIONS
BILL 1-POWER SUPPLY
"Fix only " the following  distribution boards to be supplied by the client:

4 way TPN, bus bar rated at 250A at 400V, 50Hz and short circuit withstand of 36kA for 1sec. wall mounted rigid folded sheet steel construction with removable gland plates and end walls to IP4X protection panel board comprising of 1 No. three Pole 160A MCCB incomer and MCCB out-goers as shown in the schematics
6 way TPN distribution board with MCB outgoers and  63A/300mA TPN RCCB incomer
4 way TPN distribution board with MCB outgoers and 63A/300mA TPN RCCB incomer
Reinstall the existing 8 way TPN distribution board with MCB outgoers and  63A/300mA TPN RCCB incomer
Reinstall the existing 4 way TPN distribution board with MCB outgoers and 63A/300mA TPN RCCB incomer
Supply and install the following  cables from Main switch board to sub-boards  and from sub-board to distribution boards, complete with glands, lugs and shrouds:
4x50mm2 PVC/SWA/PVC/Cu from  ATS to SB
4core 16mm² PVC/SWA/PVC/Cu for SB to DB A
Ditto but to DB B
Ditto but to DB C via Inverter
Ditto but to DB D
300mmx50mm GMS cable tray for distribution of data/tel cables
63A TPN isolator for UPS/INVERTER
SUB TOTAL FOR POWER SUPPLY
WIRING OF SUB-CIRCUITS
Supply and install the following:

Outlet point for 13A switched socket comprising of 3x2.5mm2 PVC/Cu cables wired in ring main circuit and installed in 20mm diameter  PVC conduits and 3 compartment trunking complete with all accessories excluding the 13A switched socket outlet
Outlet point for 20A DP switch comprising of 3x2.5mm2 PVC/Cu cables in 20mm diameter concealed PVC conduits complete with all accessories excluding the  20A DP switch
Lighting point by using  3x1.5mm2 PVC/Cu single core cables in 20mm diameter PVC conduits
170mmx50mm 3-compartment trunking complete with all necessary accessories for installation of power outlets and data/telephone outlets
Outlet point for45A DP cooker control unit comprising of 3x4mm2 PVC/Cu cables in 20mm diameter concealed PVC conduits complete with all accessories excluding  the 45A DP switch
FITTINGS
Supply and install the following light fittings:
32W Modular smart sense LED lights as per NMB standard Banking hall modular lights
6W recessed LED downlights
3W recessed LED downlights
Carefully remove and reinstall twin 1200mm  tubular luminaire,
T5 8W single sided exit sign for 3 hours maintained emergency lighting. THORN Voyager Economy Cat No. EEX 3M + EEXE 3, Type (E-X)
15W LED IP54 wall  round/square mounted luminaire with opal diffuser
12W LED surface  round/square mounted luminaire with opal diffuser
BILL 2 - WIRING AND FITTINGS (Continued)
Supply and install the following  ABB switches and switched sockets:
10A 1 gang 1 way switch.
10A 1 gang 2 way switch.
10A 2 gang 1 way switch.
13A twin RED switched socket outlet
13A twin WHITE  switched socket outlet
13A SINGLE   switched socket outlet
20A DP switch fitted with neon indicator.
Cooker Control unit
SUB TOTAL FOR WIRING AND FITTINGS
SAFETY AND SECURITY SYSTEMS
Supply, install, test and commission the following:
CLOSED CIRUIT TELEVISION
Camera point consiting of 25mm dia PVC conduit and a draw wire
ACCESS CONTROL SYSTEM
Acess control point consiting of 25mm dia PVC conduit and a draw wire
INTRUDER ALARM SYSTEM
Intruder alarm  point consiting of 25mm dia PVC conduit and a draw wire
FIRE DETECTION AND ALARM SYSTEM
Fire detection and  alarm  point consiting of 25mm dia PVC conduit and a draw wire
SUB TOTAL FOR SAFETY AND SECURITY
ELECTRICAL INSTALLATIONS
GENERAL SUMMARY FOR ELECTRICAL INSTALLATIONS
Preliminaries and General Conditions of Contract ( ___%)
BILL 1-POWER SUPPLY
BILL 2 -   WIRING AND FITTINGS
BILL 3: SAFETY AND SECURITY SYSTEMS
Preparation of record drawings ‘As installed’
Preparation of Maintenance Manuals
Removal of existing installations and provision of temporary working power to Branch staff
